column4: hollywoodb; If that is the best and easiest solution I'll do that. Will it delete som data? Will it update my ubuntu to the newest ubuntu?  do you got an guide or howto for dist-upgrade?
if you're on 7.04 you're in for a LONG upgrade... 7.04 -> .10 -> 8.04 -> .10
i'd have backups, but it's generally safe
